languages.text: "Среди бесконечного ужаса Океана Душ далекий свет Его подобен… пылающему сердцу. И пока оно бьется во тьме, я знаю, что смогу отыскать путь".
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."
languages.original_text: "Среди бесконечного ужаса Океана Душ далекий свет Его подобен… пылающему сердцу. И пока оно бьется во тьме, я знаю, что смогу отыскать путь".

traits.locale_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a burning heart. I see it still beating in the darkness, and I know that there is hope."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a burning heart. I see it still beating in the darkness, and I know that there is hope."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... It is akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that there is hope yet."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... It is akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that there is hope yet."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that there is hope yet."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."
"Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

languages.text: "Inmitten des grenzenlosen Grauens des Meers der Seelen gleicht das ferne Licht des Imperators ... einem großen, brennenden Herzen. Ich sehe es in der Dunkelheit schlagen und weiß, dass ich meinen Weg finden kann."
languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

traits.locale_text: "Inmitten des grenzenlosen Grauens des Meers der Seelen gleicht das ferne Licht des Imperators ... einem großen, brennenden Herzen. Ich sehe es in der Dunkelheit schlagen und weiß, dass noch Hoffnung besteht."

languages.text: « Dans la terreur sans fin de la Mer des Âmes, Sa lointaine lumière est pareille à... un grand cœur en flammes. Je le voie qui bat dans l'obscurité, et je sais que je peux trouver mon chemin. »
languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

traits.locale_text: « Dans la terreur sans fin de la Mer des Âmes, Sa lointaine lumière est pareille à... un grand cœur en flammes. Je le voie qui bat dans l'obscurité, et je sais que tout espoir n'est pas encore perdu. »

languages.text: «En el infinito terror del Mar de Almas, Su lejana luz es... como un gran corazón ardiente. Lo veo latir en la oscuridad y sé que puedo encontrar mi camino».
languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

traits.locale_text: «En el infinito terror del Mar de Almas, Su lejana luz es... como un gran corazón ardiente. Lo veo latir en la oscuridad y sé que queda esperanza».

languages.text: 「魂の海の果てしない恐怖の中で、彼の遠い光は…大きな燃える心臓を彷彿とさせます。暗闇の中で鼓動するそれを見て、自分の進むべき道を見つけられると知りました」
languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

traits.locale_text: 「魂の海の果てしない恐怖の中で、彼の遠い光は…大きな燃える心臓を彷彿とさせます。暗闇の中で鼓動するそれを見て、まだ希望があるとを知りました」

languages.text: “在灵魂之海无边的恐怖之中，祂那遥远的明光……仿佛一颗熊熊燃烧的心脏。每当我看到它在黑暗中跳动时，我就知道我会找到我的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

traits.locale_text: “在灵魂之海无边的恐怖之中，祂那遥远的明光……就像是一颗熊熊燃烧的心脏。每当我看到它在黑暗中跳动时，我就知道希望依然存在。”

languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."

languages.text: "Ruhlar Denizi'nin hudut bilmez dehşeti içinde O'nun uzaklardan gelen ışığı... Alev alev yanan muazzam bir kalbi anımsatıyor. Karanlıkta o kalbin atışını görebilir ve yolumu bulabileceğimi bilirim."
languages.original_text: "Amid the boundless terror of the Sea of Souls, His distant light is... akin to a great burning heart. I see it beating in the darkness, and I know that I can find my path."
